title: V/H/S/99
director: Flying Lotus, Maggie Levin, Tyler MacIntyre
writer: Maggie Levin, Johannes Roberts, Zoe Cooper
actors: Jesse LaTourette, Keanush Tafreshi, Dashiell Derrickson
plot: Witness a hellish vision of 1999, as social isolation, analog technology and disturbing home videos fuse into a nightmare of found footage savagery.
